mapper.select:
select sse.execute_id, (select xc.city_name from xt_city xc where xc.city_code = sse.exe_city and xc.city_level = 4) as exe_city, sse.upload_time, sse.accept_time, (select moble from app_user au where au.user_id = sse.executor) as moble from s_media_execute sse,s_media ss where sse.task_id = ss.task_id and sse.task_id = #{task_id} and sse.status = #{status} and ss.is_del = 0 order by ss.create_time
limit #{start},#{rows}

select concat(province_name,city_name,address) as target from s_media_pt smt where smt.task_id = #{task_id} order by smt.task_pt_id DESC
limit #{start},#{rows}
select ss.task_id, ss.name, ss.descript from s_media ss where ss.task_id = #{task_id} and ss.is_del = 0

select TT.cid, TT.label, TT.descript, TT.required, TT.field_type , TT.options, TT.img_url, GROUP_CONCAT(ssa.value) as value from (select sst.sort, sst.topic_id, sst.cid, sst.required, sst.label, sst.descript, sst.field_type , sst.img_url, GROUP_CONCAT(sso.option_title ORDER BY sso.option_value asc) as options FROM (select DISTINCT topic_id,cid from s_media_answer ssa,s_media ss where ssa.task_id = ss.task_id and execute_id = #{execute_id} ) as T LEFT JOIN s_media_topic sst ON T.topic_id = sst.topic_id LEFT JOIN s_media_option sso ON T.topic_id = sso.topic_id GROUP BY T.cid ) as TT LEFT JOIN s_media_answer ssa ON ssa.execute_id = #{execute_id} and TT.topic_id = ssa.topic_id and TT.cid = ssa.cid GROUP BY TT.cid ORDER BY TT.sort

select ss.task_id, ss.vendor_id, ss.task_type_id, ss.salary, ss.plat_fee, ss.name, ss.vendor_id, sse.execute_id, sse.executor, sse.upload_time, sse.accept_time, sse.score, sse.accept_reason, sse.exe_city, au.registration_id, au.platform, au.brand, stt.father_id from s_media_execute sse,s_media ss,app_user au,s_task_type stt where sse.task_id = ss.task_id and ss.task_type_id = stt.task_type_id and sse.executor = au.user_id and sse.execute_id = #{execute_id} and ss.is_del = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE s_media_execute sme INNER JOIN s_media sm ON sme.task_id = sm.task_id SET sme.status = 4, sme.score = #{score}, sme.acceptor = sm.create_user,sme.accept_time = NOW(), sme.is_agent = 1,sme.agent = #{audit_agent}, sme.is_passed = #{is_passed}, sme.passed_reason = #{passed_reason}, sm.status = (CASE when sm.status = 6 then 5 else sm.status END) WHERE sme.execute_id = #{execute_id} AND sme.status = 3

UPDATE s_media_execute sme INNER JOIN s_media sm ON sme.task_id = sm.task_id SET sme.status = 5, sme.score=#{score}, sme.acceptor = sm.create_user,sme.accept_time = NOW(), sme.is_agent = 1,sme.agent = #{audit_agent}, sme.accept_reason = #{accept_reason} WHERE sme.execute_id = #{execute_id} AND sme.status = 3

UPDATE s_media ss SET ss.status = 4 ,ss.complete_time = NOW() WHERE ss.task_id = #{task_id} AND ss.execute_times <= ( SELECT COUNT(1) c FROM s_media_execute sse WHERE sse.task_id= #{task_id} AND sse.status = 4 )

UPDATE s_media_execute sse INNER JOIN s_media ss ON sse.task_id = ss.task_id AND ss.status = 4 SET sse.status = 5, sse.score=#{score},sse.accept_time = NOW(),sse.accept_reason = #{accept_reason} WHERE sse.task_id = #{task_id} and sse.status = 3
mapper.select: select sst.label from s_media_topic sst,s_media ss where sst.task_id = ss.task_id and ss.task_id = #{task_id}

SELECT TT.* FROM (SELECT sst.label, 0 AS execute_id, 0 AS moble, sst.cid, sst.field_type, NULL AS VALUE, NULL OPTIONS, NULL AS upload_time, NULL AS exe_city FROM s_media_topic sst WHERE sst.task_id = #{task_id} ORDER BY sst.sort ASC) AS TT UNION SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT sst.label, ssa.execute_id, (SELECT moble FROM app_user au WHERE au.user_id = ssa.user_id) AS moble, ssa.cid, ssa.field_type, GROUP_CONCAT(ssa.value) AS VALUE, GROUP_CONCAT(sso.option_title) AS OPTIONS, sse.upload_time, xc.city_name FROM s_media_answer ssa LEFT JOIN s_media_topic sst ON ssa.task_id = sst.task_id AND ssa.topic_id = sst.topic_id AND ssa.task_id = #{task_id} LEFT JOIN s_media_option sso ON ssa.task_id = sso.task_id AND ssa.topic_id = sso.topic_id AND ssa.option_id = sso.option_id LEFT JOIN s_media_execute sse ON ssa.execute_id = sse.execute_id, xt_city xc WHERE ssa.task_id = #{task_id} AND sse.exe_city = xc.city_code AND xc.city_level = 4 AND sse.`status` = 4 GROUP BY ssa.execute_id, ssa.topic_id ORDER BY ssa.execute_id, sst.sort ASC) AS T
